<Text: Scout Tufankjian is an Armenian-American photojournalist and author based in Brooklyn, New York.>
Triplets:<Scout Tufankjian
1:
--------------------
Text: Scout Tufankjian:  She is well known for her photos of American President Barack Obama during his campaign leading up to his presidency.
Triplets:<Scout Tufankjian
photos of American President Barack Obama
2:
--------------------
Text: Scout Tufankjian:  She is also known for her photojournalism work on the Armenian diaspora.
Triplets:<Scout Tufankjian
